activities: Minimal personal information is collected. At most, InetSoft asks for a person’s name, company name, email, billing address, country, and telephone number. Our primary goal in collecting personal information is to provide Web site visitors and customers with a smooth, efficient, and customized experience of using the Web site, receiving customer service, and receiving billing communications.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Person’s name, company name, email, billing address, country, and telephone number. This information would be manually entered by the customer or Web site visitor or by an InetSoft employee.
recoursemech: Unresolved complaints will be handled by the American Arbitration Association which can be contacted at +1.212.484.4181 or casefiling@adr.org.
